suggestions.description: Schedule an automatic $2,021 transfer each month into investment accounts while the surplus remains strong.
suggestions.rationale: Money Guy Show guidance channels extra cash toward investment accounts once high-interest debts are handled.
suggestions.title: Automate extra investment accounts
suggestions.tradeoffs: Monthly cash cushion will shrink, so monitor variability in income or unexpected expenses.

suggestions.description: Set aside about $402 per month until you have 2 months of expenses ($8,050) saved.
suggestions.rationale: Money Guy Show guidance prioritizes liquidity so unexpected expenses don't derail the plan.
suggestions.title: Build a 2-month buffer
suggestions.tradeoffs: Slows other goals temporarily but boosts resilience.

suggestions.description: Boost recurring contributions by roughly $1,470 to keep long-term investments aligned with the growth-focused guidance.
suggestions.rationale: Compounding works best when contributions rise alongside surplus cash flow.
suggestions.title: Increase automated investing
suggestions.tradeoffs: Reduces take-home flexibility and assumes markets cooperate in the long run.
